stork.net

Class HTTPBody

  • java.lang.Object
    • stork.feather.Resource<HTTPRequest,HTTPBody>
      • stork.net.HTTPBody

  • public class HTTPBody
extends Resource<HTTPRequest,HTTPBody>
    A representation of an incoming HTTP request. This object provides accessors for request metadata, as well as a tap/sink-based abstraction layer to the Netty backend.

    • Field Summary
